website_summaries.verdict: Made with the flexible and portable silicone of other models, this model stands out for being especially dust proof and easy to clean, making it a good option for locations where messes are a possibility.
pros: Silicone material is lightweight and easy to transport
Compatible with almost all desktop and laptop devices with current operating systems
Waterproof, making it not only resistant to spills, but also easy to clean using water and cloth
Resists picking up dust and other particles, so that even in extremely messy environments the keyboard will avoid getting too dirty
cons: This keyboard is designed for occasional use, and might quickly show signs of wear with frequent use

customer_reviews.title: Not a Well Designed Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this keyboard, I liked the design. It was very flexible which concept was new to me. But I tried it. I liked the that fact it was quiet. However, the keys stick together and when hitting the keys, the results on the screen show double characters and spacing. Not good. The manufacturer needs to redesign the keyboard so the keys don't stick.
customer_reviews.author: Harry H. Husted

customer_reviews.title: Easy to clean, works well...
customer_reviews.text: Don't know about you guys, but working from home has increased the amount of time I spend at my keyboard. Which means more stuff on the keyboard. This keyboard allows me to just wash it in the sink when too much cruft gets on it. I can also spray it with rubbing alcohol to sanitize it (without worrying about liquid damage). Took a star off for comfort, as the key throw is shorter and the key spacing is a little tighter, both of which you get used to after a while. Overall, I have zero regrets - this keyboard's great,
customer_reviews.author: jmcgready

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical, but so far this keyboard has held up. I've traveled with it three times and set up it after pulling out of a bag about a dozen. Works great and stores rolled up, very small. Good feel overall for what it is, although there are some button placements that might take getting used to depending on what you've used in the past and what type of typing you do. The transition was easy for me. ***I wish they made one without the additional numeric keypad, so it was even smaller. Maybe they do and I missed it.
customer_reviews.author: Laplace Transform

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good with this thing. I'm honestly impressed. It works fantastically, and is so quiet, too! The only problem I've encountered thus far, other than just getting, used to it is that the [delete] key is so sensitive, that when I go to press the [end] key, the [delete] key is also activated, but this is not entirely awful; it's just a bit of a nuisance when I'm trying to write code or something. Otherwise, I think, especially for the price, that this is an amazing buy. If you're in the market for a flexible, portable keyboard, or if you're just looking looking for a quieter option, you should definitely give this thing a try!
customer_reviews.author: Noah Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Keyboard!
customer_reviews.text: I always try to write reviews as to do my part in helping other people who shop at Amazon. This keyboard is absolutely INCREDIBLE!!!! It is responsive to EVERY COMMAND, exceeds ALL of my expectations in every category!!!! So good, I am buying another one asap for when I travel. One of the best purchases I ever made at Amazon, almost as good as the Sangean PR-D5 radio I bought years ago here on Amazon. Buy this with supreme confidence!
customer_reviews.author: John Taormino

customer_reviews.title: Registers multiple key presses
customer_reviews.text: This did not work correctly. For example, if I pressed the enter key, the apostrophe would register. If I pressed the colon key, both the colon key and the double quote key would register. That's not very useful.
customer_reviews.author: A Customer

customer_reviews.title: Between this and another one like it, I returned one and had to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Between this and another one like it, I returned one and had to get the other (I forget exactly why) but it was because of the noise of typing that I did go with it for as long as it could (seems to wear easy for being rubber, the print goes first then the whole thing stays a bit warped worn in). The volume level of typing was great just want I wanted. I don't know why but I feel like my typing is like eating Doritos, I HATE HOW LOUD IT IS, or maybe it's just because I like nights and life in apartments.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas R Forystek

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable keyboard that is easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I write for a living and I needed a keyboard that was water and dustproof. I was apprehensive about this purchase ut it turns out that I was happily surprised. It works great and the keys are very responsive. There is only a small learning curve with it, as there is whenever you change from a keyboard you are used to. I love it now.
customer_reviews.author: Dgreer1986

customer_reviews.title: Buttons don't work after one wash
customer_reviews.text: Typing this on my laptop's keyboard... The concept for this keyboard is great - rolls up and is easy to clean! It does both of those functions well. However after delicately hand washing with sponge and dish soap, internal wiring must not be very durable because afterwards buttons functioned oddly or didn't work. Initially all buttons inputted option+ characters so "hello" looked like this:  ̇'¬¬ø. The most lasting result is both delete and backspace buttons do not work. I've tried replugging, re-recognizing within system preferences and relaying still unable to delete. Seems the option+ has gone away but sometimes "i" will type with random other letters, "random" would look like this "riiaindiom".
customer_reviews.author: Kaiser B.

customer_reviews.title: Used it once and then it stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the keyboard for a trip I was taking and wanted a portable keyboard with the number pad. I am sorely disappointed as I am now on the trip without a keyboard. I went to pug it in on my second day and it will not work. I have tried rebooting the computer, unplugging it and replugging it and still cannot get it to work. I would not suggest buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Reavis

customer_reviews.title: Not working like it's supposed
customer_reviews.text: Very lightweight and soft but the 1st time I used it keys are malfunctioned. It keeps adding letters as if I long pressed a key on keyboard which is annoying when I only pressed it once. Takes a long time to respond to me typing. I was hoping I wouldn't have to buy another keyboard but I will now since its malfunctioning.
customer_reviews.author: Lateefa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect keyboard but not for me, not my cup of tea
customer_reviews.text: Nothing wrong with keyboard at all, just not my cup of tea, I definitely struggled with it as a 2 fingered, look at my finger typist and could not ever get comfortable with that lack of clicking and squishy feel from the silicon. Its a great and affordable keyboard for those that are used to these but for me, a 1st time, will be my last time getting a flexible keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: thecardattic John

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this product
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. I work in a dirty environment, and normal keyboards get fouled up quickly. This flexible keyboard prevents that issue at all; just wipe it off, and it's good! The only issue so far is that it can get out of shape a bit from being in my backpack; it can be fixed with rolling it up once or twice, but it can be annoyance.
customer_reviews.author: C. Roth

customer_reviews.title: Eh
customer_reviews.text: It's nice, but the letters on the keyboard are already wearing off and I often have to retype things because the keys are not very sensitive. You have to pound down on them to get them to recognize that you are typing. Kind of frustrating. I probably wouldn't buy this product again. But I do like that it is waterproof and easy to clean.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea Monk

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at how much I like it.
customer_reviews.text: After killing my last 2 keyboards with drinks, I thought enough! So I bought this. I really like clackity keyboards and thought this one was going to bother me. There is a slight learning curve but now I love it I actually make less mistakes on it. I did order a keyboard stand from ikea as I like my keyboard at an angle. Other than that, it's a great little keyboard. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: omg

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but I wish it would have lasted longer.
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this keyboard, but the buttons are starting to short out on it. I press the enter key, and I get a ] along with it. Other keys are beginning to act funny, too.
customer_reviews.author: Jason, NR0X

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Update: one of the features that I wanted from this keyboard was to roll it up and store in a round DVD container when I wasn’t using it. Just put it into the container for the first time and when I took it out, it no longer worked. Seemed to be shorted because the computer went crazy with characters. Pretty irritating. Very nice product and great for high dust / moisture environments.
customer_reviews.author: Charlie R Chisholm

customer_reviews.title: Finnicky
customer_reviews.text: Can't pick up all button presses accurately, especially on softer surfaces. It's completely waterproof, as advertised; you can't dunk it in water or anything, but you can spill things on it and it works fine
customer_reviews.author: ⸮

customer_reviews.title: The lettering fades.
customer_reviews.text: After extensive use, the lettering on the major keys have faded. I tried rewriting the letters using permanent markers, but those faded even quicker than the original ink. I'm forced to buy another keyboard; I opted for a mechanical one so that I can switch keys if necessary instead of having to replace the entire board.
customer_reviews.author: Smithy

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard is garbage. The circuit board inside seems to float around ...
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is garbage. The circuit board inside seems to float around so it doesn't always line up with the right keys, or spots will get trapped and you'll end up with 13 spaces after a word or brackets instead of apostrophes. At this point it's only a month old and nearly unusual. Going back to the Sienoc flex keyboard that lasted more than two years.
customer_reviews.author: Meranath

customer_reviews.title: Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Well this was very handy and space efficient, it was very difficult to type on I had to return it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Letter wore off quickly
customer_reviews.text: I do like the concept of having a flexible keyboard to roll up and toss wherever. Used it for about 2 months, in that time half of my letters on the keys have worn off almost completely and the buttons at times do not register. Needs to be perfected first, would not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to start using, just plug the USB cord in, no setup required. Works well so far. Backspace key is positioned slightly differently than standard, requires a little adjustment. Sometimes skips the 'm' or 'n' unless key pushed a bit harder. Very portable and convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly H

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Had it less than 3 weeks. Keys stick, don't reliably activate, and several letters mostly worn off. I need a silent keyboard, but unless you want to replace at very regular intervals, keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Horror movie holic

customer_reviews.title: Simple does it's job
customer_reviews.text: My son love pulling out the keys from my old keyboard so I bought this one, now he can't pull any out, I don't have to look for missing keys every time.
customer_reviews.author: Zhi

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: This product is terrific for typing quickly on a tablet or smartphone. My Samsung S9 just came with an adapter that fits this keyboard perfectly! Being a USB plug in device, it has many applications.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Moore

customer_reviews.title: Losing function only weeks after purchase EDIT: Useless less than a month after purchase
customer_reviews.text: The letters on the keyboard were fading literally a week after having purchased it. ASDF are barely visible. I added a photo to show this. Edit: Add to that, within three weeks, the 6 key on the ;number pad is randomly adding a + after the number. This seriously affected an online test I was doing for a potential new job where speed was of utmost importance. Edit: Several weeks after writing this is was virtually unusable, keys sticking or even activating when my fingers were nowhere near them. By its very nature, this keyboard should not have sticking keys! I am never touching anything from this company again.
customer_reviews.author: D. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat this even with the most expensive flex keyboards
customer_reviews.text: Perfect slim flexible keyboard. The keys are extremely responsive. I would imagine the average speed typist could use this with no slow down. Rolls up fairly tight with no issues after. All keys work and the usb cord is perfect length for most setups. I would recommend this keyboard over all others I have tried when it comes to flex keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Bought 2 for my daughters for christmas. Bought adapters so they can use with cell phones and tablet, as they are always writing stories. Rolls up easily to store and travel. Needs to be used on a hard surface, not your lap.
customer_reviews.author: Gen Apple

customer_reviews.title: keypad labeling rubs off quickly
customer_reviews.text: I haven't been using this product a month yet and the letters/numbers are gone on the most used keypads.... I can still use it as I type without looking, but sometimes would like to have that info to refer to and not have to guess.
customer_reviews.author: CDaley

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: loved that it was full-size keyboard. very lightweight. reacts nicely to every key stroke. highly recommend for working on the go!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Erica Cruz

customer_reviews.title: it is easy to be stacked dust and easy to be taken ...
customer_reviews.text: it is easy to be stacked dust and easy to be taken off printed alphabet when i use this, i push harder than normal key board but it's really light and comfortable to pack, so when i go on a business trip i take this keyboard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No brainer great bargain
customer_reviews.text: Nice, it is responsive enough even though it's rubberized and lower profile than standard keyboards. Great for travel, stores compactly in my laptop backpack, and the price is super nice for the quality and features.
customer_reviews.author: JSJ

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Love it, easy to use and because it rolls up it is easy to move out of the way to use more desk space when the key board is not in use.
customer_reviews.author: Joann Romans

customer_reviews.title: Good if your prone to spills
customer_reviews.text: The main reason why i bought it was that i have a problem with sitting my coffee to close and got tired of replacing keyboards. Its a little weird to get used to but it has the spill advantage and it is very quiet. The only small problem you would have is after a period of time the letters will fade on the keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: D Martin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work well with med to long acrylic nails, buttons are fading already, I got this 2 months ago.
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: Great little roll-away keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly easy to type on, rolls up and out of the way, and was priced right. Took a guess or two to figure out that the blank keys on the bottom are the Windows keys, but they're in the right position. Very happy with this!
customer_reviews.author: David G.

customer_reviews.title: 3 days after it showing up to the house and ...
customer_reviews.text: 3 days after it showing up to the house and the letters rubbed off the keys. Half of the letters aren't even there that day. That's a real bummer. Will be looking to get a refund, what's of the keyboard without letters?
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Holland

customer_reviews.title: Did not last.
customer_reviews.text: Lasted 2 days and the some of the keys just would not respond. There are better flex keyboards out there. Keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Whisper Quiet Keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I love using this keyboard! My co-workers arent bothered by my typing. Easy to clean. Only con, lettering wears off quicky.
customer_reviews.author: I Botello

customer_reviews.title: Nice keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Love the keyboard. I am a heavy typer thus no one around me can hear me pounding the key. The only drawback is the letters are starting to lighten
customer_reviews.author: True Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keys are normal sized like my regular keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Keys are normal sized like my regular keyboard. It has worked pretty well so far. i would have hoped the backspace key was bigger, but that's the only thing. It's nice to have a silicone keyboard that doesn't have a shift key that's half the normal size.
customer_reviews.author: Dacota R

customer_reviews.title: I love them. So quiet
customer_reviews.text: My 2nd Rocksoul flexible keyboard. The zeros kept getting stuck on the old one. It lasted around 2.5 years. I love them. So quiet!
customer_reviews.author: CC in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Letter fading
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use.. BUT the lettering literally started to fade 5 mins into use... Sent back for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Marieti

customer_reviews.title: Ripoff
customer_reviews.text: I made sure it was compatible with my desktop, but would not work.
customer_reviews.author: Cindyt

customer_reviews.title: junk space bar is unreliable
customer_reviews.text: when i use this device the space bar will jump across the screen and is very frustrating i really like the thin water proof presentation.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice to carry along to go with a tablet with too small of a keyboard for my hands.
customer_reviews.author: N M.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Very happy... It was a little weird when I got it, the characters were mixed up but I think it configure itself because after a few days it was working fine...
customer_reviews.author: Murderous Crow

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable to type on
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a flexible keyboard with keys that responds without having to press hard on, and haves a full space-bar key unlike the others that haves 2 separate half-size space-bar keys. Great flexible keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: ShelfSale

customer_reviews.title: My go to for travel!
customer_reviews.text: This works well as my travel keyboard for my work laptop - light weight & easy to roll up for storage. No batteries to keep track off & no hassles with TSA!
customer_reviews.author: Gailyn A. Bassler

customer_reviews.title: its a good keyboard just not what grandma was looking for
customer_reviews.text: grandmother didn't like it because it did not light up like the last one she ruined by spilling her wine on it.
customer_reviews.author: Mackie.pope

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: this thing is awesome!... no click noise and I can wash it!.. works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: Drummer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: perfect for my son who tends to be rough on key boards
customer_reviews.author: kasper

customer_reviews.title: Very soft by slow
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard is very soft to use, however its show when typing. Also the letters on the keyboard are getting to fade with only one month of use.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a month then wiped it off with water and stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Laws

customer_reviews.title: So far so good hasn't spilt anything on it yet though so don't ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son who has broken 3 keyboards by spilling drinks on them. So far so good hasn't spilt anything on it yet though so don't no how waterproof. He loves it though.
customer_reviews.author: Wilcox

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Easy plug and play. I could not find a clear cover for it. Bummer.
customer_reviews.author: In love with JC

customer_reviews.title: Great keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Incredible keyboard. Keys are soft and responsive. I recommend this to anyone looking for a keyboard
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: practical
customer_reviews.text: Its really smoth to be typing in this keybord. I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: BaruchRobles

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it. I type all day for work and it allows my hands to stay flat on the desk. No more dirt and dust under my keys. The letters are beginning to wear off but again that is with 8-10 hours of use per day.
customer_reviews.author: Shana Bunn

customer_reviews.title: Keys stopped working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable on the hands although keys stopped working after 6 months of use. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as the one I had before it that simply ...
customer_reviews.text: Almost as good as the one I had before it that simply wore out. Although, mine came with 'barely there' numbers and letters on the keys--very hard to read unless you're super familiar with it--and the backspace, erase button is just as tiny as the first one. The worst thing is after a month it's still not pressing the 'T' key as easy as the others and tends to give you double strikes when you naturally try and over compensate. The previous one I had was SO SILENT, between that and my Dell Inspiron 15R laptop (also the quietest laptop I've ever used), no one would ever know you were working.
customer_reviews.author: Xak

customer_reviews.title: I have to occasionally have need of a key board ...
customer_reviews.text: I have to occasionally have need of a key board for work, never know when. this allows me to carry a full size key board where I couldn't normally
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Bowers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me. Use it for my Raspberry Pi.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie the Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, but could definitely use some media controls
customer_reviews.text: Not bad to type on. Wish the whole row of f keys would comtrol media like other keyboards commonly do
customer_reviews.author: SeanF

customer_reviews.title: This keyboard works well but has no click or detente ...
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard works well but has no click or detente feel so it takes a little getting use to.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Olds

customer_reviews.title: Works nicely and a great use in my woodworking shop where ...
customer_reviews.text: Works nicely and a great use in my woodworking shop where dust in the keyboard is a real issue. I can just rinse or vacuum when needed.
customer_reviews.author: Prinnie

customer_reviews.title: Save yourself money and don't buy it.
customer_reviews.text: It's terrible in every way possible. I got it a bit ago and I couldn't even get it to properly work on my computer.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Flexible keyboard
customer_reviews.text: Using this keyboard in a dusty environment on a long USB cord. Very cheap solution when compared to getting a dust enclosure for the pc. Now the pc can be far away from the dusty area and I don't have to worry about the keys sticking or dust damaging the keyboard
customer_reviews.author: mr brian crudden

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this item didn't last long before some keys stopped working. not worth purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: momo

customer_reviews.title: I type pretty fast and I don't always hit each key dead-center ...
customer_reviews.text: I type pretty fast and I don't always hit each key dead-center or super hard. No problem with this board. I can fly along and it registers every key. If this one every wears out, I'll be getting another.
customer_reviews.author: Mike and Deb C.

customer_reviews.title: You also don't have to touch right on the center of the key for the keystroke to take like my last keyboard required
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is a replacement for a previous silicone keyboard I had that died. This keyboard is much more sensitive to touch than my last keyboard. You also don't have to touch right on the center of the key for the keystroke to take like my last keyboard required. As of this moment, I would definitely recommend this product for purchase.
customer_reviews.author: S Dempsey

customer_reviews.title: Even on different hard surfaces I seem to fat finger the keys way too easily.
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is really difficult to type on. Even on different hard surfaces I seem to fat finger the keys way too easily.
customer_reviews.author: Katie Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: For what it is, this is a ridiculously quiet and high quality flexible keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: CGESS

customer_reviews.title: Letters on keys are wearing off
customer_reviews.text: After a couple of months the letters are already wearing off and the keyboard has not been cleared or any solution used on it!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This keyboard is awesome!! It does its purpose for what it's intended to do. Even though they should make a keyboard that has the keys light up becuase at night the keys arent visible (obviously) overall great keyboard
customer_reviews.author: David Guevara

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a great keyboard and I've had no issues with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Difficult to type, keys not as responsive as a regular keyboard. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Kenny Hou

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Awesome! so quiet & transportable, no worries of spilling on either!
customer_reviews.author: ST

customer_reviews.title: Great silicon keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: Great silicon keyboard. Wished the backspace was larger like standard keyboard. I have been using it a while now and it is quiet and comfortable once you get used to a different type of feel to the keyboard. Be aware that silcon in general likes to hold on to hair and lint and small light objects. Easy to clean though.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: its easy to carry around and so light. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great travel keyboard
customer_reviews.text: I use this as a travel keyboard. It gets rolled up and stuffed inside a cookie tin, until I get to where I'm going. As a travel keyboard, it's awesome. It works flawlessly and doesn't seem to mind being stuffed into a tin and bounced around in my laptop bag. I wouldn't want to use this permanently (since I like tactile feedback on my key presses), but I did use this for over a month on a long trip with no trouble at all. Works fine with Windows 7 and Windows 8.
customer_reviews.author: Vik V

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: It's very different from what I'm used to but I like it so far. Got tired of keyboards that get gunked up with dust and everything else that happens to fall between the keys. There are some extra keys that I'm not used to yet but it's not too bad.
customer_reviews.author: HyleTX

customer_reviews.title: I'm assuming it would work fine if my iPad had a USB port but it ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm assuming it would work fine if my iPad had a USB port but it doesn't and that is what I bought it for. It has not been used! Still in the package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works in a classroom
customer_reviews.text: I am a teacher, it stood up to a classroom of 2nd graders with very little issue. It did get a little funky around the space bar, some of my kids liked to roll it and play with it, some did it without thinking because they fidget. A bit of strategic rolling and pulling straightened it out, and it worked perfectly before, during, and after, just was not laying flat on the table until I played with it a bit. Wipe it down with a Lysol wipe when it gets sticky (because they are 2nd graders and things end up getting sticky) and keep going. Worked much better than the standard keyboard they were pulling keys off of.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good industrial grade keyboard.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the keyboard and the sillicon they used doesn't seem to be of poor quality and since I'm an onsite engineer this comes in pretty handy for the steel plant I work at, although the keys are a little too soft if your used to mechanical keyboards.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed H.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for the price! Small for travel.
customer_reviews.text: Great for those that travel frequently and like a full size keyboard. Very easy to type on. Occasionally have to hit the enter key an extra time, but works well for the price. Easy to roll up and put in a small storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: S. Richerson

customer_reviews.title: Not exactly durable
customer_reviews.text: The keyboard itself was nice, but all the keys on the extremitys of the keyboard went out in the first week, it's hard to use a keyboard that has a disfunctional space and shift key
customer_reviews.author: Adam Hughes

customer_reviews.title: nice quality for the price with a couple small issues
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality. My complaints are the windows logo is not printed on the windows leys to the left and right of the space bar. It's visually annoying. And that odd key between the space bar and the left Alt that types backslashes for some reason.
customer_reviews.author: Selim Boudjock

customer_reviews.title: I returned the first one and the second one still ...
customer_reviews.text: I returned the first one and the second one still didn't work on my windows 7 laptop. As soon as I tried to use it on the internet, everything went bonkers...i couldn't get to any website, it would bring up 10 windows for no reason....I couldn't do anything. This happened with both units. I used it on 3 different ports too so it's not my PC. I'm wondering how true the other reviews are.
customer_reviews.author: R. Ellsperman

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed in my shop.
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a CNC machine in a dirty environment. This is not a place where a lot of typing is required, but this keyboard is easy enough to type on.
customer_reviews.author: HR

product_meta.title: ROCKSOUL Flexible Keyboard Slim Water & Dust Proof (KB-101F106B)
product_meta.description: Portable: The keyboard is light weight , ultra-slim and very compact. It would be a perfect companion for travel, school, and many industrial or medical environment. It fits easily in your briefcase, backpack or notebook carrying case and you don't have worry about any sharp edges. Waterproof: With its waterproof silicone material, you don't have to worry about damaging the keyboard because you can't ! You could spill a beverage on it and all you have to do id simply wipe or clean it off and continue to use it . Dirt & amp; Dustproof: The keyboard can be used safely in high dusty environment. Perfect for factories, industrial warehouse, retail facilities or anywhere where dust may be present. Washable : The keyboard is completely sealed preventing germs from entering anywhere in side the keyboard. Great for medical facilities since the keyboard surface can be washed and disinfected at any time to avoid the spread of infectious disease. The black flexible, full-sized silicone keyboard is spill-proof and foldable Perfect for travel Easily cleaned with a damp cloth or disinfectant spray Comes sub Fully compatible with IBMAT, Windows 98/2000/up/vista/windows 7/8/8.1/ OSX upper to Yosemite
